TopicTitle: Thumbnails are deleted after using certain parts in VAB

Articles.Content:
So this is the second time this has happened to me. Yesterday I was building in the VAB and after I added a Mainsail engine, the game refused to create anymore saves, so I re-launched KSP and was stuck while loading on parts/thumbs/mainsail. I went and checked the file and the png for the mainsail was missing. The file was there but there was no png in it's place. I deleted all mods and tried again, same problem occurred. I googled a png of the mainsail and simply replaced the empty file with it. The game loaded up after that no problem. 

About 20 minutes ago, same thing happened, except this time there's 13 missing png's. I can go through and do the same thing I did last time, but it seems like there's a bigger issue at play. I did re-install my mods after I fixed it the first time, but I haven't heard of anyone having this problem with mods installed. In fact I haven't heard of anyone else having this problem at all.

I'm at a loss here so any suggestions would be great.

Mods Active: EVE, Tweakscale
